text: The Family Computer Disk System, Famicom Disk System, FCD, FCDS or FDS is a disk add-on for the Nintendo Entertainment System that was only released in Japan despite being announced in America. It used floppy disks which made it very easy for piracy to occur. == Other websites == * Video of Disk System features at Powet.TV * More Disk System video at Powet.TV * Video Game Den - Disk System game reviews, screenshots, boxart * Famicom World - More information on the Disk System * N-sider.com - NintendOnline - 4 page article about Nintendo's online history Category:Storage devices Category:Nintendo hardware
title: Family Computer Disk System
